Solid.effects: Your hand-to-hand attacks inflict one additional damage point No penalties for carrying heavy objects. Undocumented: You can kick people out of a room.

Sprinter.name: Sprinter
Sprinter.description: The Sprinter always puts their best foot forward! They get additional Movement Points.
Sprinter.effects: You earn an additional 2  every time you convert - (Does not stack with  Anti-Grav Scooter). Expeditions involving a Sprinter will allow an additional planetary zone to be explored

Strateguru.name: Strateguru
Strateguru.description: After displaying a certain degree of megalomania, it can be mistaken for talent. You are an expert in intergalactic warfare, but everyone thinks you're crazy.
Strateguru.effects: 50% of chance of reducing each wave of Hunters by 33%.

Survivalist.name: Survivalist
Survivalist.description: The Survivalist is great to have on exploration missions. They can defend themselves more effectively against extra-terrestrial life forms and generally deal with these encounters better than anyone else.
Survivalist.effects: Expedition : All damage is reduced by one point. Expedition : The action Provision gives one additional steak. Expedition : Last to die if a team fatality occurs.

Technician.name: Technician
Technician.description: Qualified to repair materials, equipment and the hull of the Daedalus.
Technician.effects: +1  (Repair Action Point) per day. Chance of success on Repairs doubled. Bonus for developing certain NERON projects. Can reinforce and dismantle objects

The Optimist.name: The Optimist
The Optimist.description: The end of humanity... worse things happen at sea, right?
The Optimist.effects: The optimist loses one less  per day.

Torturer.name: Torturer
Torturer.description: The torturer knows all the pressure points and most sensitive areas with which they can convey their most important message... "You WILL talk."

Tracker.name: Tracker
Tracker.description: The tracker can see the comings and going of every team member. Furthermore, they can print any research results during the game via the Tabulatrix. This provides a list of players of which at least one is Mush.
Tracker.effects: Full access to movement history. Able to print secret list on the Tabulatrix.

U-Turn.name: U-Turn
U-Turn.description: You've got to know how to change your certitudes
U-Turn.effects: When on an expedition, if there's an emergency, you can return to the Daedalus for 2 .

Victimizer.name: Victimizer
Victimizer.description: Certain well-targeted remarks can have unexpected results.
Victimizer.effects: For 1 , you can chastise someone. This crewmate gains Pariah status. The Pariah's actions are 20% less likely to be successful. Covert actions become  Secret. If the Pariah dies and was  Mush, the Victimizer earns 8 . Otherwise they lose 8 .

Wrestler.name: Wrestler
Wrestler.description: The wrestler's german suplex makes the vertebrae of your enemies tremble.
Wrestler.effects: Your attacks in hand-to-hand combat inflict an additional 2 damage. Undocumented: You can kick people out of a room.

Patrol Ship.name: Patrol Ship
Patrol Ship.description: [Hull and Charges levels] It's no longer all shiny and new, but it does the job

Dynarcade.name: Dynarcade
Dynarcade.description: Dynarcade, this old war machine originally put together to train rookies can easily be converted into a video game.

Jukebox.name: Jukebox
Jukebox.description: The jukebox is great for a little relaxation session from time to time.
Jukebox.info: An awesome jukebox from back in the day. Even better, it comes pre-loaded with the crew's favorite tunes!

Oxygen Tank.name: Oxygen Tank
Oxygen Tank.description: The Oxygen tank stores the oxygen necessary for the crew to continue with their asphyxiation avoidance strategy.  Daedalus oxygen reservoir, operate with caution. DO NOT EMPTY for a laugh.

Bed.name: Bed
Bed.description: The bed allows you to sleep to restore . Sweet dreams!

Shower.name: Shower
Shower.description: Hygiene allows you to stay healthy. Anything can happen in space, and sometimes a good shower gets you back in the game after intergalactic life throws you one curveball after another.

Thalasso.name: Thalasso
Thalasso.description: Hygiene allows you to stay healthy. Anything can happen in space, and sometimes a good shower gets you back in the game after intergalactic life throws you one curveball after another.

Antenna.name: Antenna
Antenna.description: This impressive piece of kit reduces the cost of communications actions by 1. The manual states that the stellar antenna is the "must have" communications device, with a bandwidth of 24 Baud, it allows you to effortlessly communicate with the other end of the universe.

Auxiliary Neron Terminal.name: Auxiliary NERON Terminal
Auxiliary Neron Terminal.description: NERON's Core gives access to NERON projects
Auxiliary Neron Terminal.info: NERON's core is where it is possible to modify programs to improve functionality.

Combustion Chamber.name: Combustion Chamber
Combustion Chamber.description: The combustion chamber is found in the Engine Room. This is used to supply the reactors with fuel for the journey.  Fuel reserve for a diesel engine. Sublime technology with a very particular purpose. The fuel transfer channels don't work any more, the liquid must be moved from the reservoir nozzles to the combustion chamber. The designers might as well have powered it with coal...

Emergency Reactor.name: Emergency Reactor
Emergency Reactor.description: Allows the Daedalus to proceed in the case of a PILGRED failure. There is some life left in the old diesel technology dog yet. In any case, it's the only way to get the Daedalus moving. Each reactor is capable of burning 2 units of fuel per journey.

Lateral Reactor.name: Lateral Reactor
Lateral Reactor.description: Located in the Engine Room, the lateral reactor allows the Daedalus to turn.

PILGRED Reactor.name: PILGRED Reactor
PILGRED Reactor.description: The PILGRED Reactor. When the Daedalus set off, these were the only means of travelling faster than the speed of light. Getting it working again could allow you to return to Sol. Tear through space-time in complete safety.

Planet Scanner.name: Planet Scanner
Planet Scanner.description: Significantly upgrades the Astro Terminal. +30% chance of finding a planet Music plays when you start it up. The engineers responsible for this were eccentric at best... Who would have thought that Verdi could have inspired this glorified calculator..

CryoModule.name: CryoModule®
CryoModule.description: The Cryosleep module is where you take long sleeps. It's your responsibility never to go back there.

Gravity Simulator.name: Gravity Simulator
Gravity Simulator.description: This device allows gravity to be artificially simulated. This makes it a lot easier for the crew to move around the ship.

Mycoscan.name: Mycoscan
Mycoscan.description: Allows traces of Mush spores to be detected in living organisms.  Prototype Mush detector, originally designed by Eleesha then perfected during the Magellan project.

Research Lab.name: Research Lab
Research Lab.description: The laboratory allows the crew to carry out the most ground-breaking research on Mush.  A super ultra modern lab with computers with compact fluorescent lights and high density perforated cards.

Camera.name: Camera
Camera.description: In the presence of a camera, secret and covert actions are revealed.  When a camera is installed in a room, all logs are saved in the history and displayed publicly. The camera also logs covert and furtive activity. It doesn't work if it is in your personal inventory.
Camera.info: Hover: The camera is an extremely useful tool for spying, observing your neighbors.

Door.name: Door
Door.description: The doors of the Daedalus are fragiles and have the infuriating habit of jamming... If you find a broken one, report it to an engineer. Whatever it's made of, regardless of its density or condition , a door always leads somewhere.

Swedish Sofa.name: Swedish Sofa
Swedish Sofa.description: Who would have thought that a plywood structure and a few cushions could be so relaxing...
Swedish Sofa.info: Hover: A superb sofa in hand-stitched Nubuck leather. Designed in Sweden but produced cheaply on Encalade.

BIOS Terminal.name: BIOS Terminal
BIOS Terminal.description: Allows the NERON admin to alter certain AI behaviors aboard the ship.During NERON's psychotherapy, its interface was opened to make it more flexible. The input-output interface remains available to a handful of people..

Calculator.name: Calculator
Calculator.description: Lets you calculate stuff... All that remains is to find out what...  Allows you to calculate something #NO_BG here

NERON's Core.name: NERON's Core
NERON's Core.description: NERON's Core gives access to NERON projects.  NERON's core is where it is possible to modify programs to improve functionality.

Fuel Tank.name: Fuel Tank
Fuel Tank.description: The Fuel tank is where the valuable carburant is stored and is also equipped with a distributor.  Daedalus fuel tank, operate with caution. DO NOT SMOKE.

Coffee Machine.name: Coffee Machine
Coffee Machine.description: This fantastic coffee machine produces pure Arabica coffee at a speed approaching that of light. Unfortunately the machine has a similar energy consumption to a failing nuclear power station, and in the absence of the PILGRED reactor you'll have to make do with a cup every 24 hours.  The coffee machine is man's best friend. After cats.

Kitchen.name: Kitchen
Kitchen.description: A domain reserved for a certain mustachioed celebrity. Also occasionally used for cooking.  Intergalactic elite chef's post. Certain martial arts skills may be necessary.

Surgery Pod.name: Surgery Pod
Surgery Pod.description: This pod contains all necessary automated medical equipment for effective healthcare. In the event of hard knocks, you should probably know where this is.

Comms Center.name: Comms Center
Comms Center.description: The Comms Center allows contact to be made with distant networks. This ultra-modern Comms Center is where research findings are analysed, collated and combined with radar information etc. It also allows you to establish long-distance communication channels.

AstroTerminal.name: AstroTerminal
AstroTerminal.description: Enables a player to search for and scan planets. The Astro Terminal lets you scan nearby space in search of planets to explore. The information contained within is strictly reserved for navigators as to keep the crew's morale up.

Command Terminal.name: Command Terminal
Command Terminal.description: The Command Terminal is uniquely available to the Commandant. Access Forbidden. Allows the Commandant to do his duty. The Piloting module contains loads of tools to make the daily running of the Daedalus simpler.

Turret.name: Turret
Turret.description: Defense against the Hunters is a priority comrade ! Firing post for the Thingumatron 3000. Cutting edge design with toughened glass shields and a teslatron make it a formidable weapon against the Hunters.

Narcotic Distiller.name: Narcotic Distiller
Narcotic Distiller.description: The distiller is used for manufacturing pharmaceutical products. Alas, its erratic behaviour means that the final product is of varying efficacy. Happiness dispenser approved by Albus Haxley.

Icarus.name: Icarus
Icarus.description: Allows you to take the Icarus on new adventures. The Icarus was an elite exploration vehicle... a few hundred years ago!

Pasiphae.name: Pasiphae
Pasiphae.description: It's no longer all shiny and new, but it does the job
